edu.ncsu.csc.cucumber

Class EditRecipeStepDefs

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.cucumber.EditRecipeStepDefs

  • public class EditRecipeStepDefs
extends java.lang.Object
    Step definitions for automated black box tests using Cucumber and Selenium. Automates the black box tests located in the GitHub wiki.
    Author:
    Benjamin Seifert (beseifer@ncsu.edu)

    • Constructor Detail

      • EditRecipeStepDefs

        public EditRecipeStepDefs(SharedRecipeData srd)
        Constructor for the RecipeStepDefs. Used to keep track of CoffeeMaker's state to ensure that the test completed successfully.
        Parameters:
        srd - SharedRecipeData; a backup of the recipes to ensure that the CoffeeMaker is behaving appropriately.

    • Method Detail

      • addSpecificRecipe

        @Given(value="^the CoffeeMaker has a recipe with name: (.+); cost: (\\d+); and ingredients: (\\d+) coffee, (\\d+) milk, (\\d+) sugar, (\\d+) chocolate$")
public void addSpecificRecipe(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                                         int cost,
                                                                                                                                                                                         int coffeeAmt,
                                                                                                                                                                                         int milkAmt,
                                                                                                                                                                                         int sugarAmt,
                                                                                                                                                                                         int chocolateAmt)
                                                                                                                                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a recipe with the specific parameters given
        Parameters:
        name - name of the recipe
        cost - price of the recipe
        coffeeAmt - amount of coffee
        milkAmt - amount of milk
        sugarAmt - amount of sugar
        chocolateAmt - amount of chocolate
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is an error

      • selectRecipe

        @When(value="^I select recipe (.+) for editing$")
public void selectRecipe(java.lang.String name)
                                                                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns to the homepage and then navigates to the edit recipe page to select the the recipe with the name provided for editing.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the recipe to select
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if thread sleep is interrupted

      • checkTable

        @Then(value="^the recipe displays correctly in the table with name: (.+); cost: (\\d+); and ingredients: (\\d+) coffee, (\\d+) milk, (\\d+) sugar, (\\d+) chocolate$")
public void checkTable(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                                               int cost,
                                                                                                                                                                                               int coffeeAmt,
                                                                                                                                                                                               int milkAmt,
                                                                                                                                                                                               int sugarAmt,
                                                                                                                                                                                               int chocolateAmt)
        From the Edit Recipe page, verifies that the form is filled in properly according to the parameters passed in.
        Parameters:
        name - expected name in the form
        cost - expected cost in the form
        coffeeAmt - expected coffee amount in the form
        milkAmt - expected milk amount in the form
        sugarAmt - expected sugar amount in the form
        chocolateAmt - expected chocolate amount in the form

      • editRecipe

        @When(value="^I edit that recipe to have new cost: (.+); and ingredients: (.+) coffee, (.+) milk, (.+) sugar, (.+) chocolate$")
public void editRecipe(java.lang.String cost,
                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String coffeeAmt,
                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String milkAmt,
                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String sugarAmt,
                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String chocolateAmt)
                                                                                                                                                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Selects a recipe to edit and edits it according to the parameters given.
        Parameters:
        cost - new cost for the recipe
        coffeeAmt - new coffee amount for the recipe
        milkAmt - new milk amount for the recipe
        sugarAmt - new sugar amount for the recipe
        chocolateAmt - new chocolate amount for the recipe
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if thread sleep encounters error

      • checkValidEdit

        @Then(value="^the recipe is edited and the form is cleared$")
public void checkValidEdit()
                                                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks that the form is cleared after submission of a valid recipe and the appropriate message is displayed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if edit fails

public void checkError()
